Each year we hold different types of symposium and courses for students and professors interested in something and something else. We invite Phd students to participate and contribute with their current research this is done in collaboration with other institiutes and organizations. The following shows programs from current and recent gatherings, snekkersten, IOC and matrix

Snekkersten Symposium

Here you can find detailed information about this years Symposium in Snekkersten. Click the link to see the current program and content or sign up to participate by following the link

About ISMC

The ISMC is located in Copenhagen city, Denmark, and was established at the Department of Rheumatology at Bispebjerg Hospital in conjunction with the establishment of a professorship in Sports Medicine at the University of Copenhagen in 1997.

Visit us at
